train.question: Scientists launch a rocket into space for a mission. Once the rocket escapes the gravitational pull of Earth, how will the mass and weight of the rocket be affected?

The mass will change, but the weight will stay the same.

Earth is a kind of planet.

Gravity means gravitational pull.
Affected means changed.
Stay the same means not changing.
Weight means the force of gravity acting on an object.
To act on means to affect.
answer: The mass will stay the same, but the weight will change.
